Text: Yo here is an advice YIFY, you want to add some quality to your videos while using the same setting, just use 10-bit encoding instead of 8-bit, cheers partner.
thanks, people will not be impressed with 10bit since it isnt supported on xbox/ps3  and many media players.

But new android nadiOS devices supports it ;)

Who cares about ps3/xbox?

Selfbuild HTPC is the thing.

If I was encoding for purely personal use I would use 10bit without thinking twice. but since this is all done for the people i guess I cant really drop all xbox and PS3 and some media player support at this point
